data.Name: William Kiernan
data.staff_title: Dean, School for Global Inclusion and Social Development
data.staff_bio: "William Kiernan is the dean of UMass Boston’s School for Global Inclusion and Social Development. For the past 40 years
data.staff_ed: as well as a senior staff member of Boston Children’s Hospital. He has been a member of the UMass Boston faculty for more than 20 years.
